full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RNAM RTOG GI BTAGS PA'I GNOD PA'I RIGS BZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,('DI LTAR RNAMS RTOGS GIS BTAGS PA'I GNOD PA'I RIGS BZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI,  'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA'I RGYAL PO'I RGYAL SRID KYI BLON PO RIN CHEN, TSO RIGS PA'I STOBS KYI 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BA'I CHING GIS RIGS LAS BYUNG BA'I, JANG JONG CHEN PO CHEN WANG GI SRAS LNGA PA, BSTAN SRID KYI RIGS DANG LDAN PA GUNG RKYANG RGYAL MTSAN RDO RJE AER KHE AA HAS DANG, GSO COS RIG PA'I BLO GROS RGYAS PA AA CHI THU TAR HANG THO YON CHOS BLO BZANG CHOS 'BYOR ZHES BYA BA GNYIS KA'ANG, NAN TANG CHEN PO GSUNG GI YANG YANG 'DI LTA BU'I ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR KHRAL DU, KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI @018B THA SHAL PA, NYON MONGS KYI 'BRAN DU 'KHOL PA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS, SA SKYE PA PAn CHEN GYI LAS TSOGS LA BRTEN NAS BSGRIGS PAR BGYIS PA 'DIR DGE BA YOD NA, DE YIS BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG, BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SKYES BU'I SKU TSE'I RGYAL MTSAN BRTAN PA DANG, BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG BSKUL BA PO SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD GNAS SKABS DANG MTHAR THUGS KYI BGEGS DANG BRAL NAS PHAN PA DANG BDE BA RGYA CHEN PO BYUNG BA'I GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
